COULD_YOU_REPEAT_THE_ORIGINAL_REQUEST.message: Could you repeat the original request?

CRIMINAL_RECORD.message: Sorry, Commander. I have been informed that your criminal record is incompatible with this task. Please check back when you resolve this issue.

FAILURE_1.message: Hello {you} It's {name} again. - If you are viewing this it's because the mission has failed -. All trace of this mission will be eliminated. - This has never happened.

FAILURE_2.message: {org} says the case {target} was solved by another, the {cash} is not yours

FAILURE_3.message: {org} laments your failure in the case {target}, you have lost {cash}.

INSUFFICIENT_LEVEL_COMBAT.message: Sorry, Commander. A rating greater than 0 is required for this task. Please check back when you resolve the issue.

INTROTEXT.message: Hello, I am {name}, agent of {org} - The existence of {target} has become {reason} for one of our clients - We offer a reward of {cash} to the one who definitely solves this problem.

IT_MUST_BE_DONE_AFTER.message: You must act when the target leaves the space station and prevent return. It is very important avoid any problems with local authorities. It is advisable to act outside the radius of policing, that is, in general, more than 100 km from the station.

KILLED_3.message: is no longer in this world

PAID_SITE.message: If the contract is executed successfully, you will immediately be  informed of the place where you must go to receive their reward. In case of failure, all traces of this mission will be removed and this has never happened.

REASON_1.message: a imminent danger to the security of

SUCCESS.message: {org} closes the case {target}. His {cash} was transferred.

SUCCESSMSG.message: Hi {you}. {name} again. - If you are viewing this its because {target} {dead} and the mission has been accomplished successfully. - A reward of {cash} is waiting for you just {dist} away, don't delay.

TAUNT_1.message: You're following me, trash? Well here I am! I'll give you a message for {org}

TAUNT_2.message: Are you an envoy of {org}? Here I have something for them!

TAUNT_3.message: {org} must be very wrong to send morons like you.

X_WILL_BE_LEAVING.message: Reliable information ensures us of certain activities at {system} ({sectorX}, {sectorY}, {sectorZ}) Our local agents will ensure take off from {spaceport} on this date and time exactly: {date}. You must do their work quickly, but without attracting the attention of local police. {target} is traveling in a {shipname} {shipregid}, heavily armed.
